duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct contract review and administration in support of contract acquisition and fulfillment.
Oversee subcontract administration; review and negotiate requested changes.
Review contract performance requirements and performance schedules.
Advise management of contractual rights and obligations; compile and analyze data; and maintain historical information.
Monitor company conformance with contract requirements.
Prepare and disseminate information regarding contract status, compliance, modification, deviation, and termination.
Maintain contractual records and documentation including correspondence, customer contact information, contract changes, and status reports.
Participate in teaming agreements and strategic marketing alliance negotiations between company and outside sources.
Work closely with Project Managers, Project Accounting, and Business Development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's (or equivalent) with 3 or more years of contract admin. experience
